title: Who Is the World’s Strongest Appraiser? ~Living in Another World With Satisfying Meals~ - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Adventurers   Beast Companions   Beastkin   Carefree Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Cheats   Chefs   Cooking   Cute Story   Eye Powers   Fantasy World   Lack of Common Sense   Male Protagonist   Special Abilities   Transported to Another World
author: Minatose Tsukasa   港瀬つかさ
description:
One day, the otomen high school boy, Yuri Kugamiya, was suddenly transferred to another world. And within a dungeon, even. Fortunately, Yuri’s otherworld daily life began when he was picked up by the Scarlet Lynx clan.

Eh? The skill he posses, [God’s Eye], is super rare? Thanks to that his job is Seeker? So you mean he’s the strongest appraiser? It’s true that he possesses these, but for an otomen who gets to experience another world… he’s going to selfishly live a carefree, slow life.

With that, this is a story about a boy who pushes ahead with his otomen ways, living a househusband-like life despite transferring to another world, and even despite getting a cheat,>
